Speaker: andy
Dialogue: You saved the day again, Woody.

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: C'mon, let's wrangle up the cattle.

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: Can we leave this up 'til we move?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Pull my string!  The birthday party's today?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh, hey Sarge, have you seen Slinky?

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Oh...well alright, you can be red if you want.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Not now, Slink.  I've got some bad news.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Just gather everyone up for a staff meeting and be happy!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh!! You got me again, Etch! You've been working on that draw.  Fastest knobs in the west.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Got a staff meeting, you guys, come on, let's go!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Now where is that -- ?  Aw, hey, who moved my doodle pad way over here?

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Were you scared?  Tell me honestly.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: I was close to being scared that time.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: I'm going for fearsome here, but I just don't feel it.  I think I'm just coming off as annoying.

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: I wanted to thank you, Woody, for saving my flock.

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: Whadda ya say I get someone else to watch the sheep tonight?

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: Remember, I'm just a couple of blocks away.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Come on, come on!  Smaller toys up front.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hello?  Check?  Better?  Great. Everybody hear me?  Up on the shelf, can you hear me?  Great! Okay, first item today...oh, yeah. Has everyone picked a moving buddy?

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Moving buddy?!  You can't be serious!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Well I didn't know we were supposed to have one already.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, yeah, you guys think this is a big joke.  We've only got one week left before the move.  I don't want any toys left behind.  A moving buddy -- if you don't have one, get one!  Alright, next...uh...oh, yes. Tuesday night's "Plastic Corrosion Awareness" meeting was, I think, a big success and we want to thank Mr. Spell for putting that on for us. Thank you, Mr. Spell.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Ok, uh...oh yes.  One minor note here...  Next we have --

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: What?!  Whadda ya mean, the party's today?!  His birthday's not 'til next week!!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: What's going on down there?  Is Mom losing her marbles?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Well, obviously she wanted to have the party before the move.  I'm not worried.  You shouldn't be worried.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Hey, hey!  Come on, Potato Head! If Woody says it's all right, then, well, darnit, it's good enough for me.  Woody has never steered us wrong before.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: C'mon, guys!  Every Christmas and birthday we go through this.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: But what if Andy gets another dinosaur?  A mean one?  I just don't think I can take that kind of rejection.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey, listen, no one's getting replaced.  This is Andy we're talking about.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: It doesn't matter how much we're played with.  What matters is that we're here for Andy when he needs us.  That's what we're made for. Right? Everyone is now looking down, sheepish.

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Pardon me.  I hate to break up the staff meeting, but THEY'RE HERE! Birthday guests at three o'clock!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Oh, boy.  Will ya take a look at all those presents?!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Yessir, we're next month's garage sale fodder for sure.

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Ah, for crying out loud, they're all in boxes, you idiot!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Wait!  There's a nice little one over there!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: If I send out the troops, will you all calm down?

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Eh, very good, Woody.  That's using the old noodle.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Sargent.  Establish a recon post downstairs.  Code red.  You know what to do.

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: Alright men, you heard him.  Code Red!  Repeat: We are at Code Red! Recon plan Charlie.  Execute! Let's move move move!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: And this --  -- is how we find out what is in those presents.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Shouldn't they be there by now? What's taking them so long?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey, these guys are professionals. They're the best.  C'mon, they're not lying down on the job.

Speaker: wounded soldier
Dialogue: Go on without me.  Just go!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: A good soldier never leaves a man behind.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: This is it!  This is it!  Quiet, quiet, quiet!

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: Mission accomplished.  Well done, men.  Pack it up, we're going home.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: So did I tell ya?  Huh?  Nothing to worry about.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: I knew you were right all along, Woody.  Never doubted you for a second.

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: Wait -- turn that thing back on!

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: He's really excited about this one. It's a huge package.  Oh -- get out -- one of the kids is in the way, I can't see...

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: It's a WHAT?! WHAT IS IT?!!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, no!  Turn 'em around, turn 'em around!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Plus is positive, minus is negative! Oh, let me!

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: Let's go to my room, guys!

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: RED ALERT!  RED ALERT!  ANDY IS COMING UPSTAIRS!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Andy's coming, everybody!  Back to your places.  Hurry!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Outta my way!  Here I come, here I come --

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: -- and you press his back and he does a karate-chop action!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: What the heck is up there?

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Woody?  Who's up there with you?

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Woody, what are you doing under the bed?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh-h-h-h...nothing!  Uh, nothing. I'm sure Andy was just a little excited, that's all.  Too much cake and ice cream, I suppose.  It's just a mistake.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey!  What did I tell you earlier? No one is getting replaced.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Now let's all be polite, and give whatever it is up there a nice, big "Andy's Room" welcome.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Buzz Lightyear to Star Command. Come in, Star Command.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Star Command - come in.  Do you read me?  Why don't they answer?!! Just then, Buzz catches sight of his ripped packaging.  The box is designed to look like a spaceship.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Blast!  This'll take weeks to repair!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Buzz Lightyear Mission Log. Stardate 4072: My ship has run off course en route to sector 12.  I've crash landed on a strange planet. The impact must have awoken me from hyper-sleep.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: No read-out yet if the air is breathable... and there seems to be no sign of intelligent life anywhere --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Aaaaaaah!  Whoa, hey, whoa, did I frighten you?  Didn't mean to. Sorry.  Howdy!  My name is Woody and this is Andy's room.  That's all I wanted to say, and also, there has been a bit of a mix-up. This is my spot, see, the bed here --

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Local law enforcement!  It's about time you got here.  I'm Buzz Lightyear, Space Ranger, Universe Protection Unit.  My ship has crash landed here by mistake.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Yes, it is a mistake, because, you see, the bed, here, is my spot.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I need to repair my turbo boosters. Do you people still use fossil fuels, or have you discovered crystalic fusion?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Well, let's see, we've got double A's --

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Do you know these life forms?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Alright, everyone.  You're clear to come up.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I am Buzz Lightyear.  I come in peace.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Oh, I'm so glad you're not a dinosaur!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Why, thank you...  Now thank you all for your kind welcome.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Hey, Woody's got something like that.  His is a pullstring, only it --

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Oh yeah, but not like this one. This is a quality sound system. Probably all copper wiring, huh? So, uh, where are you from? Singapore?  Hong Kong?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Well...no, actually I'm stationed up in the Gamma Quadrant of Sector 4.  As a member of the elite Universe Protection Unit of the Space Ranger Corps, I protect the galaxy from the threat of invasion from the Evil Emperor Zurg, sworn enemy of the Galactic Alliance.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: And I'm from Mattel.  Well, I'm not actually  from Mattel, I'm actually from a smaller company that was purchased in a leveraged buy-out. Well, I don't really understand the financials, but...

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: You'd think they've never seen a new toy before.

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: Well sure, look at him.  He's got more gadgets on him then a Swiss army knife.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Ah, ah, ah, please be careful!  You don't want to be in the way when my laser goes off.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: It's not a laser!  It's a little lightbulb that blinks!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: All right, that's enough.  Look, we're all very impressed with Andy's new toy --

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Excuse me, I think the word you're searching for is Space Ranger.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: The word I'm searching for I can't say because there's pre-school toys present.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Oh, uh, Mr. Lightyear?  Now I'm curious.  What does a Space Ranger actually do?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: He's not a Space Ranger!  He doesn't fight evil or shoot lasers or fly --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, what?!...What?!  These are plastic.  He can't fly!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: They are a terillium-carbonic alloy and I CAN fly.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I tell you, I could fly around this room with my eyes closed!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Okay then, Mr. Lightbeer!  Prove it.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: All right, then, I will.  Stand back everyone!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Whoa!  Oh, wow!  You flew magnificently!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Why, thank you.  Thank you all. Thank you.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: That wasn't flying!  That was falling with style!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Heh, heh, heh!  Golly bob howdy --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, shut up!  In a couple of days, everything will be just the way it was.  They'll see... they'll see. I'm still Andy's favorite toy.

Speaker: shark
Dialogue: Look, I'm Woody.  Howdy, howdy, howdy!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Your Chief, Andy, inscribed his name on me.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Well, I must get back to repairing my ship.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh, let what?  I don't -- Uh, what do you mean?  Who?

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: I know Andy's excited about Buzz, but you know, he'll always have a special place for you.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Listen, Lightsnack, you stay away from Andy.  He's mine, and no one is taking him away from me.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: What are you talking about?  Where's that bonding strip?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: And another thing.  Stop with this spaceman thing.  It's getting on my nerves.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Are you saying you want to lodge a complaint with Star Command? WOODY Oh okay, so you want to do it the hard way, huh?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Don't even think about it, cowboy!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: How dare you open a spaceman's helmet on an uncharted planet!  My eyeballs could've been sucked from their sockets!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: You actually think you're THE "Buzz Lightyear?" Oh, all this time I thought it was an act!  Hey, guys!  Look!  It's the REAL Buzz Lightyear!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, no, no, no...  Buzz, look!  An alien!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: I thought he was at summer camp!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: They must have kicked him out early this year.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: I can't tell.  Hey, where's Lenny?

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Oh, no.  I can't bear to watch one of these again!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Nothing that concerns you spacemen. Just us TOYS.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I'd better take a look anyway.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Why is that soldier strapped to an explosive device?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No!  No, that's Scud, you idiot!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: He tortures toys -- just for fun.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Well, then we've got to do something!

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: What are you doing?!!  Get down from there!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I'm going to go teach that boy a lesson.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Yeah, sure.  You go ahead.  Melt him with your scary laser.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Be careful with that, it's extremely dangerous.

Speaker: lenny
Dialogue: He's lighting it!  He's lighting it!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz, I would love to see you try.  'Course I'd love to see you as a crater.

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: The sooner we move the better.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!!  Oh, Buzz, Buzz Lightyear!! Buzz Lightyear, thank goodness! We've got trouble!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Down there.  Just down there.  A helpless toy...it's...it's trapped, Buzz!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Then we've no time to lose!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, he's there.  Just, just keep looking.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: I don't see him in the driveway!  I think he bounced into Sid's yard.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Hey everyone!  RC's trying to say something!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Wait a minute.  You -- you don't think I meant to knock Buzz out the window, do you Potato Head?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Now, it was an accident!  Guys, c'mon now, you...you gotta believe me

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: We believe you, Woody.  Right, Rex?

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: Where is your honor, dirtbag?!  You are an absolute disgrace!  You don't deserve to --

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: I don't think we should give him the chance.

Speaker: sargent
Dialogue: There he is, men!  Frag him!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: I got dibs on his hat!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, no, no, no!  Wait!  Wait I can explain everything --

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: Mom!  Do you know where Buzz is?

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: But Mom, I can't find him!

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: I couldn't find my Buzz.  I know I left him right there.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: It's too short!  We need more monkeys!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: There aren't any more!  That's the whole barrel.

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: Can I help pump the gas?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, great.  How am I gonna convince those guys it was an accident?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!  You're alive!  This is great! Oh, I'm saved!  I'm saved!  Andy'll find you here, he'll take us back to the room, and then you can tell everyone that this was all just a big mistake.  Huh?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I just want you to know that even though you tried to terminate me, revenge is not an idea we promote on my planet.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: But we're not on my planet, are we?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Ok!  Come on!  You want a piece of me?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Doesn't he realize that I'm not there?  I'm LOST!  Oh, I'm a lost toy!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Buzz Lightyear Mission Log.  The local Sheriff and I seem to be at a huge refueling station of some sort --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Shut up!  Just shut up, you idiot!!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Sheriff, this is no time to panic.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: This is the perfect time to panic! I'm lost, Andy is gone, they're going to move from their house in two days and it's all your fault!!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: My fault?!  If you hadn't pushed me out of the window in the first place --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, yeah?  Well, if YOU hadn't shown up in your stupid little cardboard spaceship and taken away everything that was important to me --

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Don't talk to me about importance. Because of YOU the security of this entire universe is in jeopardy.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: WHAT?!!  What are you talking about?!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Right now, poised at the edge of the galaxy, Emperor Zurg has been secretly building a weapon with the destructive capacity to annihilate an entire planet.  I alone have information that reveals this weapon's only weakness.  And you, my friend, are responsible for delaying my rendez-vous with Star Command.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: YOU ARE A TOY!!!  You aren't the real Buzz Lightyear, you're an action figure!!  You are a child's plaything!!!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: You are a sad strange little man and you have my pity.  Farewell.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, yeah?  Well, good riddance, ya looney!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, no!  I can't show my face in that room without Buzz.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, Buzz, you've gotta come back. I found a spaceship!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Now you're sure this spacefreighter will return to its port of origin once it jettisons its food supply?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh-huh.  And when we get there, we'll be able to find a way to transport you...home.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, no, no, wait, Buzz, Buzz, let's get in the back.  No one will see us there.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Negative.  There are no restraining harnesses in the cargo area.  We'll be much safer in the cockpit.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: It'll be safer in the cockpit than the cargo bay.  What an idiot!

Speaker: robot guards
Dialogue: You are clear to enter.  Welcome to Pizza Planet.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: There you are.  Now the entrance is heavily guarded.  We need a way to get inside.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Great idea, Woody!  I like your thinking!

Speaker: robot guards
Dialogue: You are clear to enter.  Welcome to Pizza Planet.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Quickly, Sheriff!  The airlock is closing.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: What a space port.  Good work, Woody.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Now we need to find a ship that's headed for Sector 12 --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Wait a minute!  No Buzz!  This way! There's a special ship.  I just saw it!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Where is it?  I don't see the --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Okay, Buzz, when I say "go," we're gonna jump in the basket --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Dooh!  No!  This cannot be happening to me!!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Greetings!  I am Buzz Lightyear!  I come in peace!

Speaker: aliens
Dialogue: Tell us!  What is it like outside?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: What's gotten into you, Sheriff?  I was --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: YOU are the one that decided to climb into this --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Stop it, you -- !  Stop it, you zealots!

Speaker: aliens
Dialogue: He must go!  Do not fight the claw! Do not anger the claw!  He has been chosen.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Sheriff!  I can see your dwelling from here!  You're almost home.

Speaker: alien
Dialogue: Nirvana is coming!  The mystic portal awaits!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: You guys don't get it, do you? Once we go into Sid's house, we won't be coming out.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Whoa, Scud!  Hey, boy.  Sit!  Good boy!

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Hey, I got somethin' for ya, boy.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Did I get my package in the mail?

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: I'll have to perform one of my...operations!

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Oh, no.  We have a sick patient here, nurse.  Prepare the O.R., STAT!

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: No one's ever attempted a double bypass brain transplant before.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Now for the tricky part -- pliers!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I don't believe that man's ever been to medical school.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: She's lying!  Whatever she says it's not true!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: We are gonna die.  I'm outta here!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Locked!  There's gotta be another way out of here.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey!  Hi, there, little fellah! Come out here.  Do you know a way out of here?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: May day!  May day!  Come in, Star Command!  Send reinforcements!...  Star Command, do you copy?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I've set my laser from stun to kill.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, great, great.  Yeah, and if anyone attacks us we can blink 'em to death.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Hey, you guys!  I think I've found him.  Buzz!  Is that you?!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Whiskers!  Will you get out of here?!  You're interfering with the search and rescue.

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: He's not here, Mom.  Woody's gone.

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Well waddah-ya-know, the weasel ran away.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Who would've thought he was capable of such atrocities?!

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: Oh, Slink, I hope he's okay.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: I can see your will is strong.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Well, we have ways of making you talk.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Where are your rebel friends now? Heh, heh.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Are you alright?  I'm proud of you, Sheriff.  A lesser man would have talked under such torture.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: I sure hope this isn't permanent.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Still no word from Star Command. We're not that far from the spaceport --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: The door!  It's open!  We're free!!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Woody, we don't know what's out there!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: They're gonna eat us, Buzz!!  Do something!  Quick!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: It's not working.  I recharged it before I left.  It should be good for hours --

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, you idiot!  You're a toy!  Use your karate chop action!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Hey!!  Hey!  How are you doing that? Stop that!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: There's no place like home. There's no place like home. There's no place like home...

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Another stunt like that, cowboy -- you're going to get us killed.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Don't tell me what to do!

Speaker: space commander
Dialogue: Buzz Lightyear, Planet Earth needs your help!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oo-o-of!  It's a secret mission in uncharted space!  Let's go!!

Speaker: hannah
Dialogue: Would you like some tea, Mrs. Nesbit?

Speaker: hannah
Dialogue: It's so nice you could join us on such late notice.

Speaker: hannah
Dialogue: What a lovely hat, Mrs. Nesbit.  It goes quite well with your head.

Speaker: hannah
Dialogue: Please excuse me, ladies.  I'll be right back.

Speaker: hannah
Dialogue: What is it, Mom?  Mom, where are you?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!  Hey, Buzz!  Are you okay?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Gone!  It's all go-o-one!  All of it's gone.  Bye-bye!  Whoo-hoo! See ya!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: One minute you're defending the whole galaxy...  ...and suddenly you find yourself suckin' down Darjeeling with Marie Antoinette and her little sisters.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: I think you've had enough tea for today.  Let's get you out of here, Buzz.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: ...I'm just a little depressed, that's all.  I can get through this.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Look at me!  I can't even fly out of a window!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: But -- the hat looked good.  Tell me the hat looked good!  The apron is a bit much, it's not my color...

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Out the window...Buzz, you're a genius!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Oh, quit your whining and pay up.

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: No, no, not the ear.  Gimme the nose.  C'mon!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: We're gonna get outta here, Buzz -- Buzz?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Boy, am I glad to see you guys!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: I knew you'd come back, Woody!

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: What are you doing over there?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: It's a long story, Bo.  I'll explain later.  Here, catch this!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Good going, Slink!  Now, just, just tie it on to something!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, no, no!  You got it all wrong, Potato Head.  Buzz is fine!  Buzz is right here.  He's with me!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, I'm not!  Buzz, come over here and you just tell the nice toys that you're not dead.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!  Will you get up here and give me a hand?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, hi Buzz!  Why don't you say "hello" to the guys over there?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Yeah, hey Buzz.  Let's show the guys our new secret best-friends hand shake.  Gimme five, man!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: So, you see?  We're friends now, guys.  Aren't we, Buzz?  You bet.  Gimme a hug.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Ha, ha, oh, I love you, too.

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: See?  It is Buzz.  Now give back the lights, Potato Head.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, it's not what you think, I swear!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No!  No!  Don't leave!  Don't leave! You've gotta help us, please!  You don't know what it's like over here!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Go back to your lives, citizens. Show's over.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Come back!  Slink!  Slink, please! Please!  Listen to me!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: He is still alive, and you're not gonna get him, you monsters!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: But -- but they're cannibals.  We saw them eat those other toys.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh...sorry.  I...I thought that you were gonna...  ...you know, eat my friend.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey!  No, no, wait!  Hey!  What's wrong?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!  C'mon, get up!  Buzz, you're...  ...get up...

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Fine.  Let Sid trash you.  But don't blame me.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: What am I gonna blow?  Man...hey, where's that wimpy cowboy doll?

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Yes!  I've always wanted to put a spaceman into orbit.  Ha-ha.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Sid Phillips reporting.  Launch of the shuttle has been delayed due to adverse weather conditions at the launch site.  Tomorrow's forecast...

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: But what if we leave them behind?

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: I'm sorry.  It's just that I get so nervous before I travel.

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: Oh, Woody, if only you could see how much Andy misses you.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Hey!  Get over here and see if you can get this tool box off me.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, come on, Buzz.  I...Buzz, I can't do this without you.  I need your help.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: I can't help.  I can't help anyone.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Why, sure you can, Buzz.  You can get me out of here and then I'll get that rocket off you, and we'll make a break for Andy's house.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Andy's house.  Sid's house.  What's the difference.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Oh, Buzz, you've had a big fall. You must not be thinking clearly.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: No, Woody, for the first time I am thinking clearly.  You were right all along.  I'm not a Space Ranger.  I'm just a toy.  A stupid little insignificant toy.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Whoa, hey -- wait a minute.  Being a toy is a lot better than being a Space Ranger.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, it is.  Look, over in that house is a kid who thinks you are the greatest, and it's not because you're a Space Ranger, pal, it's because you're a TOY!  You are HIS toy.

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: But why would Andy want me?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Why would Andy want you?!  Look at you!  You're a Buzz Lightyear.  Any other toy would give up his moving parts just to be you.  You've got wings, you glow in the dark, you talk, your helmet does that -- that whoosh thing -- you are a COOL toy.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: As a matter of fact you're too cool. I mean -- I mean what chance does a toy like me have against a Buzz Lightyear action figure?  All I can do is...

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Why would Andy ever want to play with me, when he's got you?  I'm the one that should be strapped to that rocket.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Listen Buzz, forget about me.  You should get out of here while you can.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz!!  What are you doing?  I thought you were --

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Come on, Sheriff.  There's a kid over in that house who needs us. Now let's get you out of this thing.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Come on, Buzz!  We can do it!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: We've got to get out of here...NOW.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Okay, what do I do?  Come on Woody, think!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No, no, no!  Wait!  Wait!  Listen! Please!  There's a good toy down there and he's -- he's going to be blown to bits in a few minutes all because of me.  I've gotta save him!  -- But I need your help.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Please.  He's my friend.  He's the only one I've got.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Okay.  I think I know what to do. We're going to have to break a few rules, but if it works, it'll help everybody.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Houston to Mission Control.  Come in, Control.

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Launch pad is being constructed! Heh-heh.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: All right, listen up.  I need Pump Boy here -- Ducky here.  Legs?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: RollerBob and I don't move till we get the signal.  Clear?

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: Woody?!  Great!  Help me out of this thing!

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: Oh, well, you and I can have a cookout later.  Ha-ha-ha...

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: ...and counting.  Ten!  Nine! Eight!  Seven!  Six!  Five!  Four! Three!  Two!... One!...

Speaker: sid
Dialogue: The toys!  The toys are alive!

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: What's wrong, Sid?!  Don't you want to play with Sally?!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Aaaaaahh!!  Get away, you stupid dog!  Down!  Down!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: I can't do it!  Take care of Andy for me!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: No wait!  You don't understand! Buzz is out there!  We've gotta help him!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Now let's catch up to that truck!

Speaker: lenny
Dialogue: Guys!  Guys!  Woody's riding RC! And Buzz is with him!

Speaker: bo peep
Dialogue: It is Buzz!  Woody was telling the truth!

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Great.  Now I have guilt. EXT. STREET/BACK OF MOVING TRUCK

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: Quick!  Hold on to my tail!

Speaker: slinky
Dialogue: I can't hold on much longer!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: You did it!  Next stop.  Andy.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Wait a minute...I just lit a rocket. Rockets explo --

Speaker: lenny
Dialogue: Look!  Look!  It's Woody and Buzz! Comin' up fast!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Ahhh!! This is the part where we blow up!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: This isn't flying.  This is falling -- with style!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Ha ha!!  To Infinity and Beyond!!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Uh, Buzz?!  We missed the truck!

Speaker: buzz
Dialogue: We're not aiming for the truck!

Speaker: andy
Dialogue: Which one can I open first?

Speaker: hamm
Dialogue: Hey, heads up everybody!  It's showtime.

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Whoooooah!  Oh!  Bo!  There's gotta be a less painful way to get my attention.

Speaker: rex
Dialogue: Maybe Andy'll get another dinosaur, like a leaf-eater.  That way, I could play the, uh, dominant predator.  Ha ha ha!

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Buzz.  Buzz Lightyear.  You are not worried, are you?

Speaker: woody
Dialogue: Now Buzz, what could Andy possibly get that is worse than you?!
